00001 // Wrapper for string.h on Mac
00002 #ifndef _STRING_WRAPPER_H
00003 #define _STRING_WRAPPER_H
00004 
00005 #include <string.h>
00006 #ifdef __APPLE__
00007 // need our own implementation of strnlen
00008 static size_t strnlen(const char *s, size_t n)
00009 {
00010   const char *p = (const char *)memchr(s, 0, n);
00011   return(p ? p-s : n);
00012 }
00013 #endif
00014 #endif
